content:
Here are some sample dialogues or lines that can be used in a short video showing gratitude from "One Dream" towards International Mother Language Day and the sacrifices of the martyrs in the 1952 Bengali Language Movement:

* "Today, we pay tribute to the brave souls who gave up their lives for our mother tongue. Happy International Mother Language Day from all of us at One Dream."
* "At One Dream, we understand the importance of preserving our heritage and culture. On this International Mother Language Day, let us honor the sacrifices of the language martyrs."
* "International Mother Language Day is not just a celebration of language, but also a reminder of the sacrifices that were made to preserve it. We thank the martyrs of the 1952 Bengali Language Movement for their bravery and selflessness."
* "Let us take a moment to appreciate our mother language and those who fought for its recognition. Happy International Mother Language Day from One Dream."
* "The Bengali Language Movement of 1952 was a defining moment in our nation's history. Today, on International Mother Language Day, we remember the sacrifices of those who gave their lives for our language and culture."
